content.text: Mica was a female Fregan and cousin of Lena Cobral. Though they were close, Mica tried to stop Lena from testifying against the Cobral family, although Obi-Wan Kenobi stopped her plans. Mica tried to redeem herself by shadowing Lena during a meeting with the rest of the Cobral family, but she was sniffed out and killed by Bard Cobral.
